statements: SELECT * FROM billing_invoicing;
SELECT id, total_amount FROM billing_invoicing WHERE status = 'paid';
SELECT vendor_id, invoice_number FROM billing_invoicing WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM billing_invoicing WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM billing_invoicing ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_invoicing WHERE status = 'PAID';
SELECT id, total_amount, status FROM billing_invoicing WHERE client_id = 'xyz' AND total_amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_id, invoice_number, total_amount FROM billing_invoicing WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_invoicing WHERE vendor_id = '123' OR status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY invoice_number ASC;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(id) AS total_invoices FROM billing_invoicing GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_invoices > 5 ORDER BY total_invoices DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, billing_address FROM clients WHERE client_since > '2020-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_since FROM vendors WHERE vendor_since < '2019-01-01';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT client_name, contact_person FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT client_name, billing_address FROM clients;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_since >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, billing_address FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, contact_person FROM clients WHERE billing_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT COUNT(client_id) AS client_count FROM clients WHERE client_since BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, client_name, billing_address FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendors WHERE billing_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT invoice_id, amount FROM invoices WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT client_name, billing_address FROM clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 4;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, amount FROM invoices WHERE vendor_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, address FROM Vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, amount FROM Invoices WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT client_name, vendor_name, amount_paid FROM Clients c JOIN Invoices i ON c.client_id = i.client_id JOIN Payments p ON i.invoice_id = p.invoice_id;
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT client_id, client_name, address FROM Clients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM Vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Client ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_phone FROM Client WHERE client_address='123 Main St';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_id=3;
SELECT invoice_number, amount FROM Invoice WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, description FROM Transaction WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Client WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM Client WHERE client_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM Invoice WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, invoice_number FROM Vendor JOIN Invoice ON Vendor.vendor_id = Invoice.vendor_id WHERE Invoice.amount < 500 ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM Payment WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
